vomsProxyDestroy

vomsProxyInit

public static void vomsProxyInit(String group,
                                 char[] passphrase,
                                 int lifetime_in_hours)
                          throws IOException,
                                 Exception
Creates a voms proxy for the default VO specified above and writes it to disk.

Parameters:
group - the group you want to have the proxy for (example: /APACGrid/NGAdmin)
passphrase - the passphrase of your local private key
lifetime_in_hours - how long the proxy should be valid
Throws:
Exception - if another error occured
IOException - if the proxy could not be saved to disk

vomsProxyInit

public static void vomsProxyInit(VO vo,
                                 String group,
                                 char[] passphrase,
                                 int lifetime_in_hours)
                          throws IOException,
                                 Exception
This one creates a voms proxy with the requested vo information in it and saves it to the default globus location.

Parameters:
vo - the vo you want to have the proxy for
group - the group you want to have the proxy for (example: /APACGrid/NGAdmin)
passphrase - the passphrase of your local private key
lifetime_in_hours - how long the proxy should be valid
Throws:
IOException - if the proxy could not be saved to disk
Exception - if another error occured
